skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I have a solid foundation in frontend development, specializing in React and JavaScript. With expertise in creating responsive, user-friendly interfaces using HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap, I focus on delivering seamless user experiences.

skills.title: Back-End
skills.description: I specialize in backend development with ASP.NET Core and C#, building scalable, high-performance applications. I am experienced in working with microservices, CQRS, Docker, and robust database management using MS SQL and MongoDB.

skills.title: Blockchain
skills.description: I am actively exploring blockchain development, diving into the world of decentralized applications and smart contracts. I’m particularly interested in how blockchain can transform industries by enhancing security, transparency, and efficiency.

skills.description: I’m passionate about web development, focusing on creating dynamic, responsive, and high-performance web applications using modern technologies and best practices.
